name: TOASTCHU
description:
"Toastchu" its a toast making game in VR. Only goal is complete the orders and make fun.

 This game is currently in beta release and there is not any release date or milestone yet! In the future i will add more game mods, more content and improvements to mechanics. 

Inspired by Turkish Youtuber and famous toaster "Tostçu Erol", he is known by mixing all type of ingredients in one toast.

TEAM

Gökay AYDIN (Devolopment, desing and prop models)

Emre Çiftçi(Game Design and sounds)

Thanks Göktup Demir for inspiration , environment and all other 3d models.
